languages.text: "Раскаяние рождается в муках. Душа, свободная от мук, готова впустить в себя скверну".
"Penance is born of suffering. A soul that is free from suffering is open to corruption."
languages.original_text: "Раскаяние рождается в муках. Душа, свободная от мук, готова впустить в себя скверну".

traits.locale_text: "Penance is born out of suffering. A soul that is free from suffering is open to corruption."
"Penance is born out of suffering. A soul that is free from suffering is open to corruption."
"Penance is borne out of suffering. A soul that is free from suffering is open to corruption."
"Penance is borne out of suffering. A soul that is free from suffering is open to corruption."
"Penance is born of suffering. A soul that is free from suffering is open to corruption."
"Penance is born of suffering. A soul that is free from suffering is open to corruption."

languages.text: “忏悔源于苦难，完全脱离痛苦的灵魂将会踏上腐化之路。”
languages.original_text: "Penance is born of suffering. A soul that is free from suffering is open to corruption."

traits.locale_text: “忏悔源于苦难，完全脱离痛苦的灵魂将会踏上腐化之路。”

languages.text: 「懺悔は苦痛から生まれる。苦痛から解放された魂は、腐敗に晒されている」
languages.original_text: "Penance is born of suffering. A soul that is free from suffering is open to corruption."

traits.locale_text: 「懺悔は苦痛から生まれる。苦痛から解放された魂は、腐敗に晒されている」

languages.text: «La penitencia nace del sufrimiento. Un alma libre de sufrimiento está abierta a la corrupción».
languages.original_text: "Penance is born of suffering. A soul that is free from suffering is open to corruption."

traits.locale_text: «La penitencia nace del sufrimiento. Un alma libre de sufrimiento está abierta a la corrupción».

languages.text: "Buße wird aus Leid geboren. Eine Seele, die frei von Leid ist, ist empfänglich für die Verderbnis."
languages.original_text: "Penance is born of suffering. A soul that is free from suffering is open to corruption."

traits.locale_text: "Buße wird aus Leid geboren. Eine Seele, die frei von Leid ist, ist empfänglich für die Verderbnis."

languages.text: « La pénitence naît de la souffrance. Une âme libre de toute douleur est vulnérable à la corruption. »
languages.original_text: "Penance is born of suffering. A soul that is free from suffering is open to corruption."

traits.locale_text: « La pénitence naît de la souffrance. Une âme libre de toute douleur est vulnérable à la corruption. »

languages.text: "Kefaret, acıdan doğar. Acıdan azade bir ruh, yozlaşmaya açıktır."
languages.original_text: "Penance is born of suffering. A soul that is free from suffering is open to corruption."

traits.locale_text: "Kefaret, acıdan doğar. Acıdan azade bir ruh, yozlaşmaya açıktır."
